home.logisticsP1: From our strategic hub in Slovenia, we connect the manufacturing excellence of Thailand and China directly to your doorstep. Merchandise arrives via the Port of Koperâ€”the shortest route from Asia to Central Europe.
home.logisticsP2: This logistical advantage minimizes transit times and eliminates unnecessary middlemen. The result? We can distribute Tigo Energy products anywhere in the EU at the lowest possible price.

home.moreEnergyDesc: Module-level optimization ensures maximum power harvest from every panel, even in partial shade.

home.smartMonitoringDesc: Real-time performance data for every module with the Tigo Energy Intelligence platform.
